description: Try our easy to follow Maggi Tom Yum Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Maggi Tom Yum Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt Maggi Fusian Soupy Noodles Thai Tom Yum

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan with 750ml water to simmer. Add prawns and simmer for 2-3 minutes or until prawns are cooked through. Break noodle cakes into quarters and add to saucepan. Stir in Maggi 2-minutes noodles Tom Yum flavour mix sachet.
Add mushrooms and cherry tomatoes. Return to boil, simmer a further 2-3 minutes until vegetables are just tender. Add fish sauce and lemon juice.
Serve topped with chilli and add fresh coriander leaves if desired.
